ActPublic Service Staff Relations Act
PrecisRe-appointment of THOMAS S. KUTTNER of Fredericton, New Brunswick, to be a part-time member of the Public Service Staff Relations Board to hold office during good behaviour for a period of three years, effective May 21, 2004.
